aboutPage.title: About Dubai Imports
aboutPage.subtitle: Bringing the best of Morocco to the heart of Dubai
aboutPage.ourStoryDesc1: Founded in 2024, Dubai Imports has been a pioneer in bringing authentic Maghreb products to the UAE market.
aboutPage.ourStoryDesc2: Our journey began with a passion for the rich culture and craftsmanship of Morocco, and a vision to share these treasures with the diverse community of Dubai.
aboutPage.ourMissionDesc: To bridge cultures through commerce, providing our customers with authentic, high-quality Moroccan products while supporting traditional artisans and promoting sustainable trade practices.
aboutPage.qualityAssuranceDesc: Rigorous quality control ensures only the best products reach our customers.
aboutPage.authenticSourcingDesc: Direct partnerships with Moroccan artisans and producers.
aboutPage.marketTrendsDesc: Staying ahead of design trends while respecting traditional craftsmanship.
aboutPage.futurePlansDesc1: As we continue to grow, Dubai Imports is excited to announce our plans for expansion.
aboutPage.futurePlansDesc2: In the coming years, we will be broadening our product range to include exquisite imports from Turkey and Venezuela.
aboutPage.futurePlansDesc3: This expansion aligns with our mission to bring diverse, high-quality products to the UAE market, further enriching the cultural tapestry of Dubai through commerce.
aboutPage.authenticityDesc: Proposer des produits cosmétiques et artisanaux 100% naturels, fabriqués traditionnellement.
aboutPage.sustainabilityDesc: Adopter des pratiques durables avec des matériaux respectueux de l’environnement.
aboutPage.fairTradeDesc: Soutenir les artisans locaux avec des conditions justes.
aboutPage.wellbeingDesc: Offrir des produits qui respectent la santé, la beauté et l’environnement.

DistributorPage.soldSimilarProducts: Have you sold similar products before?
DistributorPage.testimonial1Text: Partnering with Dubai Imports has been a game-changer for our business. The quality of their Moroccan products is unmatched.
DistributorPage.testimonial2Text: The support we receive from Dubai Imports is exceptional. They truly care about the success of their distributors.
DistributorPage.faq1Question: What is the minimum order quantity?
DistributorPage.faq1Answer: Our minimum order quantity varies by product category. Please contact our sales team for specific details.
DistributorPage.faq2Question: Do you offer exclusive distribution rights?
DistributorPage.faq2Answer: We offer exclusive distribution rights on a case-by-case basis. This typically depends on your business model, market reach, and commitment to our products.
DistributorPage.faq3Question: What kind of support do you provide to distributors?
DistributorPage.faq3Answer: We provide marketing materials, product training, dedicated account management, and regular updates on new products and market trends.
DistributorPage.faq4Question: How long does the application process take?
DistributorPage.faq4Answer: The application process typically takes 2-3 weeks. We'll review your application and schedule a call to discuss the partnership in more detail.
